data.title: Mark Michalowski Book List
data.meta_description: A complete list of all Mark Michalowski's books in order (6 books). Browse plot descriptions, book covers, genres, pseudonyms, ratings and awards.
data.text:
Relative Dementias

Jan-2002

/ Science Fiction

A Seventh Doctor novel with Ace. After the end of the interstellar Tulkan wars, the militaristic Tulkan War council was sentenced to memory-wiping and incarceration in a penal colony. Their weapons, advanced slavery devices and planet destroying arma...

Halflife

Apr-2004

/ Science Fiction

To lose your memory once may be regarded as a misfortune; to lose it twice looks like carelessness. The Doctor's not himself. He's not quite sure who he is, but he's definitely not himself. It doesn't help that he's forgotten quite why he came to the...

Wetworld

Sep-2007

/ Space Opera

When the TARDIS makes a disastrous landing in the swamps of the planet Sunday, the Doctor has no choice but to abandon Martha and try to find help. But the tranquillity of Sunday's swamps is deceptive, and even the TARDIS can't protect Martha forever...

Shining Darkness

Nov-2008

/ Science Fiction

For Donna Noble, the Andromeda galaxy is a long, long way from home. But even two-and-a-half-million light years from Earth, danger lurks around every corner... A visit to an art gallery turns into a race across space to uncover the secret behind a...

Chasers

Apr-2010

/ General Fiction

George's friend, Kaz, arrives at the flat with a staggering request: she and her partner Gail want to have a child, and they'd like George to be the father. George is warming to the idea - he's always wanted kids, and he can be as involved in the bab...

Ghosts of Mercury

Nov-2011

/ General Fiction

Mercury: a planet of two faces ï¿½" one side cloaked in eternal darkness, the other blistered by eternal sunshine. And balanced between the two is the World River, encircling the globe.Professor Nathanial Stone and his ward, Annabelle Somerset visit M...
